doc.title: Le Boast
doc.plot: An Englishman, Sebastian, regularly meets two macho French friends in a Pigalle café. Supposedly a 'language exchange' these meetings have degenerated into being simply an opportunity to boast about sexual conquests - but Sebastian remains mysteriously mute.The reason is his teacher girlfriend has a golden rule. He must not discuss their private life which is, in fact, extremely colorful and replete with fantasy.Unable to contain his frustration Sebastain is driven to boast about his exotic secret life to a complete stranger - but the stranger quickly finds his way into Sebastain's life. With more twists than a corkscrew this is lively and economic film making, shot in an attractive location and dealing with a subject that audiences immediately connect to.
